title: The best way to make a woman orgasm will shock you
text:
PLEASURE: A handy graph has charted the best way to give a woman an orgasm 
Unsurprisingly men find it easier to reach orgasm than women. 
In fact 91% of men reach the big-O while having sex compared to just 64% of women, according to the National Survey of Sex and Behaviour. 
Interestingly, men said that their female partners reached climax 85% of the time, which can mean only one thing – they're faking it. 
The study – of 1,931 US adults aged 18 to 59 – also quizzed people on the type of sex they were engaging in and noted which ones resulted in orgasm most frequently. 
And the results will shock you. 
To everyone's amazement anal sex was the most reliable way to make a woman orgasm , with 94% saying they reached the big-O. 13 facts you didn't know about the vagina Thursday, 28th January 2016 From the highest amount of orgasms ever achieved to the life expectancy of your pubic hair, here are 15 fascinating facts about your vagina 1 / 13 Reddit Your diet may affect how things smell down there - so maybe steer clear garlic before a night of passion. 
FIVE THRITY EIGHT BIG-O: According to research anal sex is the most reliable way to 
Stats-based website FiveThirtyEight has now turned the gob-smacking data into a handy chart, to show the most successful sex acts. 
However only 31% of women who took part in the study actually took part in anal sex, so the results may be a bit misleading. 
It might also be that people who are willing to try anal sex are more relaxed and adventurous in bed and therefore more likely to orgasm. Related videos
